field.name: summary
field.value: Allow IParameterBinder to be called after the action is finished

field.name: description
field.value: So IParameterBinder implementations can perform additional finalization logic on the bound values, such as disposing IDisposable's.

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: Couldn't this be done automatically by checking if the bound values implement IDisposable? Or is there another case for it?

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: If you want it, send us a patch.

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''By Design''. * '''Version Fixed''' changed from ''Future'' to ''2.0''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
